Html:
Hello forum,

am I right that Office 2010 Starter lacks COM support an is therefore not usable with Net Office?

Many thanks for this great project.

Theo

gimme a day please to clearify the situation. this is my first time i heard from office 2010 starter :o

Sebastian

Hi Theo,

Add-Ins are not supported in Office 2010 Starter at all. Here are some official references for Excel and Word: 

http://office.microsoft.com/en-us/starter-help/excel-features-that-are-not-fully-supported-in-excel-starter-HA010374501.aspx

http://office.microsoft.com/en-us/starter-help/word-features-that-are-not-fully-supported-in-word-starter-HA010374498.aspx

-Govert
